dict.string: Alphanumeric SenderID (1!)
**AlphaGeneral

Dear ____,


Thank you for contacting Twilio support and your interest in using Twilio's Alphanumeric SenderID service. 


Twilio supports Alphanumeric SenderID which allows you to change the "From" parameter as your Company Name, business brand, or other characters.

This feature is only available when sending messages to supported countries and for one-way messaging. To view which countries we support please view this page below:


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID   



Please note that this feature is already enabled on your account: ACd50ee277dccd2e436bacd4fbc5e35b53. Please make sure you are using your desired Alpha SenderID as the "From" parameter and not a numeric number. To learn more about how to start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please review the below page:


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID 



https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID 

 

I will close this ticket for now, please feel free to respond to reopen this ticket at anytime if you have any questions in getting Alphanumeric SenderID to work for your account.  More than happy to help!


Take care,
**Alpha SenderID - General Interest

Dear ____,
Thank you for contacting Twilio support and your interest in using Twilio's Alphanumeric SenderID service.
Twilio supports Alphanumeric SenderID which allows you to change the "From" parameter as your Company Name, business brand, or other characters. This feature is only available when sending messages to supported countries and for one-way messaging. To view which countries we support please view this page below:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
Please note that this feature is already enabled on your account: ACd50ee277dccd2e436bacd4fbc5e35b53. Please make sure you are using your desired Alpha SenderID as the "From" parameter and not a numeric number. To learn more about how to start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please review the below page:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID

I will close this ticket for now, please feel free to respond to reopen this ticket at anytime if you have any questions in getting Alphanumeric SenderID to work for your account. More than happy to help!
Take care,
7F009B60-4DAC-11E8-9A21-9F9EC7D8CDAC
!Alpha2Way

Hello _____, 



Please note that Alpha SenderIDs do not support 2-way communication. If your end users need to opt-out of receiving messages from your Alpha SenderIDs please state a Twilio long code number in the body of your message in which your customer can send a STOP message to, then configure your system to watch out of STOP messages to the Twilio long code. 


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-Started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID-for-Twilio-Programmable-SMS 


Please let me know if you have further questions.


Thanks,
Alpha SenderID - How to Opt-out when 2 Way is Not Supported

Hello _____,
Please note that Alpha SenderIDs do not support 2-way communication. If your end users need to opt-out of receiving messages from your Alpha SenderIDs please state a Twilio long code number in the body of your message in which your customer can send a STOP message to, then configure your system to watch out of STOP messages to the Twilio long code.
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-Started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID-for-Twilio-Programmable-SMS
Please let me know if you have further questions.
Thanks,

!AlphaClose

Dear  _____,


Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. Thank you for providing the information for Pre-registration for _____.


I submitted your request to our Pre-registration Team for review. Our Pre-registration Team will be reaching out to you shortly to let you know of the process of the review and will also let you know if your request is approved.


Please await for our Pre-registration Team's response which can take up to 24 hours. The response will be sent to e-mail: _______. The reference ticket number will be _____ titled - ______. The reference ticket may not appear in your inbox until after our Pre-registration Team responds. 


Thank you very much for your patience. I will close this ticket for now. Please await our SenderID Team's update and if you have further questions regarding your SenderID, please reach out to our SenderID which will be in touch with you shortly.


Take care,
AlphaSenderID - Close Out after Applying Pre-reg for Customer

Dear _____,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. Thank you for providing the information for Pre-registration for _____.
I submitted your request to our Pre-registration Team for review. Our Pre-registration Team will be reaching out to you shortly to let you know of the process of the review and will also let you know if your request is approved.
Please await for our Pre-registration Team's response which can take up to 24 hours. The response will be sent to e-mail: _______. The reference ticket number will be _____ titled - ______. The reference ticket may not appear in your inbox until after our Pre-registration Team responds.
Thank you very much for your patience. I will close this ticket for now. Please await our SenderID Team's update and if you have further questions regarding your SenderID, please reach out to our SenderID which will be in touch with you shortly.
Take care,
**AlphaRules

• Endpoint - must be on the new /Messages endpoint
  • On the newest Helper Libraries which are using the new /Messages endpoint 
  • Upgraded accounts have flag "ALLOW_ALPHANUMERIC_SENDERID" enabled
  • Trial accounts do not support Alpha SenderID
  • Check if countries are supported / check whether route has Alpha SenderID enabled and checked off - Alpha SenderID using Route Type 4
  • Check whether the SenderID customer wants to use is on SenderID Blacklist:  https://monkey.twilio.com/billing/service-configs?query=AlphanumericSenderBlacklist 

----


FOR THE CUSTOMER:


  • It does not appear that your "From" is in the supported Alphanumeric SenderID format: To start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please customize the From parameter in your API request with the Alphanumeric SenderID you will like to use. The IDs can be up to 11 characters. We accept both upper- and lower-case ASCII letters, the digits 0 through 9, and space: [A-Za-z0-9 ]. Please note that at least 1 letter has to be used.
  • Please ensure you are using the newest Twilio Helper Libraries as old Helper Libraries do not support Alphanumeric SenderID. 
  • Please make sure you are sending to countries that support Alphanumeric SenderID: https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
**General Rules when using Alpha SenderID**

• Endpoint - must be on the new /Messages endpoint • On the newest Helper Libraries which are using the new /Messages endpoint • Upgraded accounts have flag "ALLOW_ALPHANUMERIC_SENDERID" enabled • Trial accounts do not support Alpha SenderID • Check if countries are supported / check whether route has Alpha SenderID enabled and checked off - Alpha SenderID using Route Type 4 • Check whether the SenderID customer wants to use is on SenderID Blacklist: https://monkey.twilio.com/billing/service-configs?query=AlphanumericSenderBlacklist ----
FOR THE CUSTOMER:
• It does not appear that your "From" is in the supported Alphanumeric SenderID format: To start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please customize the From parameter in your API request with the Alphanumeric SenderID you will like to use. The IDs can be up to 11 characters. We accept both upper- and lower-case ASCII letters, the digits 0 through 9, and space: [A-Za-z0-9 ]. Please note that at least 1 letter has to be used. • Please ensure you are using the newest Twilio Helper Libraries as old Helper Libraries do not support Alphanumeric SenderID. • Please make sure you are sending to countries that support Alphanumeric SenderID: https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
!AlphaAllPrereg

Dear _____ ,


Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. Thank you for your interest in registering for Alpha SenderID pre-registration. 


Please note that each country requires a different application and certain questions in the application are different. We can help you pre-register for two countries at a time. Please confirm which two countries you are you interested in applying for first and I can send over the application to you to proceed with pre-registration. 


I look forward to hearing back from you. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help.


Warmest Regards,
Alpha SenderID - Customer Asking to Pre-Reg all Countries

Dear _____ ,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. Thank you for your interest in registering for Alpha SenderID pre-registration.
Please note that each country requires a different application and certain questions in the application are different. We can help you pre-register for two countries at a time. Please confirm which two countries you are you interested in applying for first and I can send over the application to you to proceed with pre-registration.
I look forward to hearing back from you. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help.
Warmest Regards,
5DA31FE0-4DAE-11E8-9A21-9F9EC7D8CDAC
!AlphaFriendly

Dear _____, 


Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. 


Please note that Friendly Name and Alphanumeric SenderID are two different things. Filling in the Friendly Name field will not work for Alphanumeric SenderID.


Twilio supports Alphanumeric SenderID which allows you to change the "From" number as your Company Name, business brand, or other characters. Please note that you will need to change the "From" parameter in order for Alphanumeric SenderID to work. Changing the "Friendly Name" will not work. 


This feature is only available when sending messages to supported countries and for one-way messaging. To view which countries we support please view this page below:


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID


Please note that this feature is already enabled on your account. Please kindly retest. To learn more about how to start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please review the below page:


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID

Please let me know if you have further questions.


Thanks,
Alpha SenderID - Incorrect Use of "Friendly Name" Instead

Dear _____,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.
Please note that Friendly Name and Alphanumeric SenderID are two different things. Filling in the Friendly Name field will not work for Alphanumeric SenderID.
Twilio supports Alphanumeric SenderID which allows you to change the "From" number as your Company Name, business brand, or other characters. Please note that you will need to change the "From" parameter in order for Alphanumeric SenderID to work. Changing the "Friendly Name" will not work.
This feature is only available when sending messages to supported countries and for one-way messaging. To view which countries we support please view this page below:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
Please note that this feature is already enabled on your account. Please kindly retest. To learn more about how to start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please review the below page:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID Please let me know if you have further questions.
Thanks,

!AlphaNoPrereg

Dear ______,


Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.


As _____ does not require pre-registration, you can feel free to change your Alphanumeric SenderID to any SenderID at anytime. Please make sure you customize the "From parameter" in your API request with "______ ".


Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help.


Warmest Regards,

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help.

!AlphaUSCA
Alpha SenderID - Does Not Support US/CA

Dear _____ ,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. I am very sorry to hear you are unable to use the SenderID _____ to _______ .
Please note that US and Canadian numbers do not support Alphanumeric SenderID messages. Below is the list of countries that support Alphanumeric SenderID, please kindly retest to the supported countries:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help.
Warmest Regards,
1CD54520-4DAD-11E8-9A21-9F9EC7D8CDAC
!AlphaEnable

Dear ______,


Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. Your account ______ is now enabled for Alpha Sender ID. To start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please customize the From parameter in your API request with the Alphanumeric SenderID you will like to use. The IDs can be up to 11 characters. We accept both upper- and lower-case ASCII letters, the digits 0 through 9, and space: [A-Za-z0-9 ]. Please note that at least 1 letter has to be used.


Please also keep in mind that Alpha Sender ID is only supported in certain countries. You'll receive a 400 response from our API when attempting to use this feature in unsupported countries. Refer to this FAQ for the complete list:


https://www.twilio.com/help/faq/sms/what-countries-does-twilio-support-alphanumeric-sender-id  


Below are a few more resources that you may find helpful in getting started with Alphanumeric SenderID:  


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID  


If you are interested in learning more about how to use Alphanumeric SenderID with Messaging Services, please view below:


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133867-Using-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID-with-Messaging-Services  


I will close this ticket for now, please feel free to respond to reopen this ticket at anytime if you have any questions in getting Alphanumeric SenderID to work for your account.  More than happy to help!


Take care,
Alpha SenderID - Enable Alpha SenderID for an Account

Dear ______,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support. Your account ______ is now enabled for Alpha Sender ID. To start using Alphanumeric SenderID, please customize the From parameter in your API request with the Alphanumeric SenderID you will like to use. The IDs can be up to 11 characters. We accept both upper- and lower-case ASCII letters, the digits 0 through 9, and space: [A-Za-z0-9 ]. Please note that at least 1 letter has to be used.
Please also keep in mind that Alpha Sender ID is only supported in certain countries. You'll receive a 400 response from our API when attempting to use this feature in unsupported countries. Refer to this FAQ for the complete list:

Take care,

!AlphaTrial

Dear _______, 


Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.


Twilio supports Alphanumeric SenderID which allows you to change the "From" number as your Company Name, business brand, or other characters. This feature is only available for upgraded accounts and for supported countries only. To view which countries we support please view this page below:


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID   


I see that you account is currently in trial. Please upgrade your account to start using Alphanumeric SenderID on your account. 


To upgrade your account, simply adding a payment method in the Billing page below:


https://www.twilio.com/user/billing   


Once your account is upgraded, your account will be automatically enabled to use

the Alphanumeric SenderID service. 


To learn more about how to use this service, please check out our Getting Started documentation below: 


https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID  


Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help. 


Warmest Regards,
Alpha SenderID - Trial Accounts Requesting for Alpha SenderID

Dear _______,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.
Twilio supports Alphanumeric SenderID which allows you to change the "From" number as your Company Name, business brand, or other characters. This feature is only available for upgraded accounts and for supported countries only. To view which countries we support please view this page below:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223133767-International-support-for-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
I see that you account is currently in trial. Please upgrade your account to start using Alphanumeric SenderID on your account.
To upgrade your account, simply adding a payment method in the Billing page below:
https://www.twilio.com/user/billing
Once your account is upgraded, your account will be automatically enabled to use the Alphanumeric SenderID service.
To learn more about how to use this service, please check out our Getting Started documentation below:
https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181348-Getting-started-with-Alphanumeric-Sender-ID
Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or further clarify. More than happy to help.
Warmest Regards,
DBA91DC0-4DAB-11E8-9A21-9F9EC7D8CDAC
!AlphaMaster

Hello ____


Thanks for contacting Twilio support about alpha sender ID pre-registration towards multiple countries.


At this time, we only approve transactional messaging use cases for pre-registered Alpha Sender IDs. These are typically messages with two-factor authentication codes or OTPs (one-time passwords), or other transactional-type communication to subscribers who have previously opted in.


If you agree with the above and would like to proceed further, please provide the following information about your company and your application. Please note that additional information is required for the countries in the second section within the table. Please let me know if you are also interested in pre-registering for these countries in the second section within the table as I will need to request additional information from you.


  1. Standard Information:


  • Company Name
  • Company Address
  • Company City, State / Province, Postal Code
  • Company Country
  • Company Phone Number
  • Company Website
  • Your email address (best contact for updates on the registration process)
  • Twilio Account SID (for the account/subaccount you will send the messages from)
  • Estimated monthly volume of messages to each country
  • A description of your use case, in particular what the content and purpose of these messages are. Please provide example messages.
  • An alphanumeric sender ID you wish to use. This ID should be purely alphanumeric, no special characters and a maximum of 11 characters
    • PLEASE NOTE: For India, your sender ID must be exactly 6 characters long.


2. Additional Information Required and Important Notes:


Cuba

Local Tax ID or License Number

Czech Republic

Please note: There is a monthly fee of $6.00 USD for Czech Republic ID pre-registration

Egypt

Supported for Etisalat Egypt only

India

Please provide a list of three separate 6-character alpha (non-numeric) sender IDs in order of preference.

Indonesia

  • Do you have a business entity based in Indonesia (local address)?
  • We will send a separate form based on whether your business is in Indonesia or not.


Nigeria

  • NOC Letter
  • CAC Local License Form


Palestinian Territory

Supports Jawwal Palestine only

Saudi Arabia

  • Confirm message content: are your messages transactional or promotional?
  • Transactional examples: auth codes, OTP, account alerts
  • Promotional examples: marketing messages, coupons


Turkey

Proof of ownership: Provide proof of Legal Ownership of your requested Sender ID


Once we have received all this information, we will review and submit your application for consideration with the local authorities, you will then hear from our senderID team on the request process individually for each country. The process takes 3-6 weeks, depending on the country. Feel free to reach out with any questions!


Thanks,
Alpha SenderID - Master List for All Pre-reg Countries

Hello ____
Thanks for contacting Twilio support about alpha sender ID pre-registration towards multiple countries.
At this time, we only approve transactional messaging use cases for pre-registered Alpha Sender IDs. These are typically messages with two-factor authentication codes or OTPs (one-time passwords), or other transactional-type communication to subscribers who have previously opted in.
If you agree with the above and would like to proceed further, please provide the following information about your company and your application. Please note that additional information is required for the countries in the second section within the table. Please let me know if you are also interested in pre-registering for these countries in the second section within the table as I will need to request additional information from you.
1. Standard Information:
• Company Name • Company Address • Company City, State / Province, Postal Code • Company Country • Company Phone Number • Company Website • Your email address (best contact for updates on the registration process) • Twilio Account SID (for the account/subaccount you will send the messages from) • Estimated monthly volume of messages to each country • A description of your use case, in particular what the content and purpose of these messages are. Please provide example messages. • An alphanumeric sender ID you wish to use. This ID should be purely alphanumeric, no special characters and a maximum of 11 characters • PLEASE NOTE: For India, your sender ID must be exactly 6 characters long. • • 2. Additional Information Required and Important Notes:
Cuba Local Tax ID or License Number Czech Republic Please note: There is a monthly fee of $6.00 USD for Czech Republic ID pre-registration Egypt Supported for Etisalat Egypt only India Please provide a list of three separate 6-character alpha (non-numeric) sender IDs in order of preference. Indonesia • Do you have a business entity based in Indonesia (local address)? • We will send a separate form based on whether your business is in Indonesia or not.
Nigeria • NOC Letter • CAC Local License Form
Palestinian Territory Supports Jawwal Palestine only Saudi Arabia • Confirm message content: are your messages transactional or promotional? • Transactional examples: auth codes, OTP, account alerts • Promotional examples: marketing messages, coupons
Turkey Proof of ownership: Provide proof of Legal Ownership of your requested Sender ID
Once we have received all this information, we will review and submit your application for consideration with the local authorities, you will then hear from our senderID team on the request process individually for each country. The process takes 3-6 weeks, depending on the country. Feel free to reach out with any questions!
Thanks,
